uk.ac.ebi.mdk.service.loader.writer
Class AbstractIndexWriter

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.ebi.mdk.service.loader.writer.AbstractIndexWriter
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultCrossReferenceIndexWriter, DefaultDataIndexWriter, DefaultNameIndexWriter, DefaultStructureIndexWriter
public class AbstractIndexWriter
extends Object

AbstractIndexWriter - 06.03.2012

Provides basic functionality for an index writer. An instance will create a new IndexWriter for the provide LucenIndex. Documents are added to the index via the add(Document) method. You can close the IndexWriter by invoking close().

Version:
$Rev$
Author:
johnmay, $Author$ (this version)

Method Detail

create

public org.apache.lucene.document.Fieldable create(org.apache.lucene.index.Term term,
                                                   String value)
Utility method for stored and indexed lucene field creation. This method allows you to specified the field name with a term. The field is stored (Field.Store.YES) and index with (Field.Index.ANALYZED)

Parameters:
term - term for the field you want to create
value - string value to store
Returns:
instance of new field

                                                   String value,
                                                   org.apache.lucene.document.Field.Store store)
Utility method for indexed lucene field creation. This method allows you to specified the field name with a term. The field is index with (Field.Index.ANALYZED)

Parameters:
term - term for the field you want to create
value - string value to store
store - whether to store the value
